page.title: 03CHRISTOPHER'S HOLIDAY.
page.content: My name is Christopher, this story is about the time when my sister and I visit Dad in the Lake District in the last two weeks of the summer holiday. We left Northampton station at 1.30pm and the journey took 4 hours.On the journey we played games like Connect4 and Chess.When we arrived we had tea at The Rembrant Restaurant. When we arrived at Dad's house we had a cup of tea, played Careers and went to bed. Next day Grandma arrived.As soon as Grandma had unpacked we had dinner. For the rest of the day we amused ourselves. The day after that Grandma and I went to Brockhole and Dad took Rachel up Helvelin, a mountain.It rained almost all day.We took a picnic lunch and went home for tea. The next day I went with Dad and Rachel went with Grandma. The next dayÂ£s weather was unsettled so we all stayed in.
